title: PM condoles over demise of journalist Amir Wasimâ€™s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 21 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday expressed grief over death of the mother of senior journalist Amir Wasim.
The prime minister sympathized with the bereaved family of Amir Wasim, who is the bureau chief of daily Dawn.
He prayed for peace of the departed soul and strength for the family to bear the loss with fortitude.
